  • Constructor Details

    • RegularPolygon

      public RegularPolygon​(double x, double y, int numSides, double length)
      constructs a regular polygon using the following parameters:
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate of center of polygon
      y - y-coordinate of center of polygon
      numSides - number of sides the polygon has
      length - the length of the sides(each side is the same length)
